headline: EXCLUSIVE: Sustainable Value Creation: Keynote Fireside with Trian Fund Management, 5th Palm Beach CorpGov Forum
summary: CorpGov and IPO Edge are pleased to provide complete video coverage of the fifth annual Palm Beach CorpGov Forum held on Nov. 5-6, featuring keynote speaker Josh Frank, Partner and Co-Chief Investment Officer at Wall Street legend Nelson Peltz’s Trian Fund Management. Mr. Frank discussed Trian’s position for the last six years at Unilever PLC […] The post EXCLUSIVE: Sustainable Value Creation: Keynote Fireside with Trian Fund Management, 5th Palm Beach CorpGov Forum appeared first on CorpGov.
